nodes.text: Bordoks were a species of friendly creature native to the forest moon Endor. The sentient Ewok species, also native to the world, used them as mounts and beasts of burden. They were related to other riding beasts, including pulga, fathiers, orbaks, and tris. The bordok was not considered stronger than the larger blurrg.

A bordok first appeared in the Star Wars Legends storybook Wicket Finds a Way: An Ewok Adventure, which was written by Melinda Luke and released in 1984. The species was confirmed to be canon when it received mention in the sourcebook Ultimate Star Wars, released in 2015.
